name: Fire Wyvern
description: Balanced wrath of flame; excels at area damage and has fire resistance.

name: Ice Wyvern
description: Breathes a freezing blast that slows or freezes targets; ideal for crowd control.

name: Lightning Wyvern
description: Wyvern variant that unleashes a lightning beam whose damage scales with melee; high burst but heavy stamina drain.

name: Poison Wyvern
description: Shoots long-range toxic projectiles that ignore armor and deal damage over time.

name: Wyvern
description: A massive dragon-like reptile with elemental breath and the ability to carry riders; must be hatched from an egg and raised.

name: Phoenix
description: A mythical bird of fire and rebirth, the Phoenix is said to burst into flames upon death, only to rise anew from its own ashes. Known for its radiant plumage, searing heat, and unmatched grace in flight, it is a symbol of immortality and renewal in countless legends.

name: Amargasaurus
description: Spiked sauropod with unique thermal regulation abilities.

name: Dakosaurus
description: Marine predator resembling a crocodile; swift underwater hunter.

name: Hyaenodon
description: Pack-based predator that gains strength in numbers.

name: Rhyniognatha
description: Giant insect with versatile combat and utility abilities.

name: Managarmr
description: Frost-breathing, agile beast capable of powerful leaps and glides.
